div.h3: Welcome to Despec Nordic – leading Nordic distributor of IT and office products.

div.h2: The preferred and most market-oriented distributor in the Nordic countries

div.p: Despec Nordic is your local partner and our presence, and many years of experience, in each of the five Nordic countries ensures a strong local knowledge. It gives us specific and relevant market information that will strengthen our business partners’ competitiveness and sales.

The services that we offer will take your business further, and we are always here to offer you our specialist expertise, our excellent logistical services as well as advanced, but highly adaptable, IT services.
We know that your business is our business, and we will continuously focus on improving and adjusting our distribution services so they will fit your needs – now and in the future.

Despec Nordic has a dedicated focus on 5 major product categories; Consumables & paper, IT products & accessories, Ergonomics & health, Printers & scanners and Office machines & office products, and we continuously strive to be the most flexible and dedicated distributor.
Our product range within the above product categories is wide and deep, and we retire products and introduce both new lines and brands on a regular basis.

By being committed and dynamic, we give our business partners the best and most reliable service. This is one of the ways we contribute to a great partnership, which will serve all parties positively and secure outstanding results.

Despec Denmark A/S
Despec Finland OY
Despec Iceland
Despec Norway AS
Despec Sweden AB
